scripts.deploy:all:test: TARGET=test CONFIG=test cd back && TARGET=test CONFIG=test yarn deploy && cd ../front && TARGET=test yarn build && TARGET=test yarn deploy
scripts.deploy:all: yarn check:target && cd back && yarn deploy && cd ../front && yarn build && yarn deploy
scripts.install:all: cd front && yarn install && cd ../back && yarn install && yarn install:extra
scripts.start: echo 'Dont `yarn start` here.  Read the docs.  You need to have four shells: first yarn start from back/ and then yarn start from front/'
